txt.en: You have encountered the Warband leader, Shaguk and his band of riders!
Shaguk and his band of riders helped loot and burn the farms of The Fallows. They roam the plains on the eastern side of The Fallows.
Shaguk and his band of riders helped loot and burn the farms of The Fallows. They roam the plains on the eastern side of The Fallows.
Shaguk and his band of riders roam the plains on the eastern side of The Fallows.
The Fallows farmland is safer now that Shaguk has been taken care of, thanks to you. The people of Forlaw appreciate your efforts.
Shaguk and his band of riders roam the plains on the eastern side of The Fallows.
